mapper.insert: INSERT INTO purchaseorderdetail ( num, purchaseorder_cod, invoice_cod, invoicedetail_num, product_cod, dday, unit_mgmt, mgmt_qty, unit_inv, inv_qty, unitprice, suppprice, vax, total ) VALUES( #{num}, #{purchaseorderCod}, #{invoiceCod}, #{invoicedetailNum}, #{productCod}, #{dday}, #{unitMgmt}, #{mgmtQty}, #{unitInv}, #{invQty}, #{unitprice}, #{supprice}, #{vax}, #{total} )
